akn:content.akn:p: (a) There are authorized to be appropriated from the Highway Trust Fund (other than the Mass Transit Account)—

akn:subsection.akn:heading: Reimbursement and Payment to Recipients for Government Share of Costs.—

akn:content.akn:p: (c) On October 1 of each fiscal year, or as soon after that date as practicable, the Secretary may deduct from amounts made available under paragraphs (1), (2), and (5) of subsection (a) for that fiscal year not more than 1.50 percent of those amounts for program support in that fiscal year.

akn:subsection.akn:heading: Grants and Cooperative Agreements as Contractual Obligations.—

akn:content.akn:p: (d) The approval of a financial assistance agreement by the Secretary under section 31102, 31103, or 31313 is a contractual obligation of the Federal Government for payment of the Federal Government’s share of costs in carrying out the provisions of the grant or cooperative agreement.

(e) The Secretary shall establish criteria for eligible activities to be funded with financial assistance agreements under this section and publish those criteria in a notice of funding availability before the financial assistance program application period.

akn:subsection.akn:heading: Period of Availability of Financial Assistance Agreement Funds for Recipient Expenditures.—

akn:content.akn:p: (f) The period of availability for a recipient to expend funds under a grant or cooperative agreement authorized under subsection (a) is as follows:

akn:subsection.akn:heading: Contract Authority; Initial Date of Availability.—

akn:content.akn:p: (g) Amounts authorized from the Highway Trust Fund (other than the Mass Transit Account) by this section shall be available for obligation on the date of their apportionment or allocation or on October 1 of the fiscal year for which they are authorized, whichever occurs first.
(h) Amounts made available under this section shall remain available until expended.
